card.name: Battle for Trost
card.text: When this battle enters, you may search your library for up to two Giant creatures, reveal them, and put on the battlefield and the other into your hand. At the beginning of your endstep, if a creature died this turn, you may remove a defense counter from this battle. When this battle is defeated, Titanize target permanent. Then investigate.

card.name: Battle for Shinganshina
card.text: When this battle enters, look at target opponent's hand and expose any number of creatures they control there. Then make 3 2/2 red Giant creature tokens. When this battle is defeated, put an Eldian from any graveyard onto the battlefield under your control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: The Invasion That Day
card.text: When this battle enters, it deals 4 damage to target Wall. Whenever one or more defense counters are removed from this battle, you may return target Eldian to your hand. When this battle is defeated, return any number of Giants to their owners' hands. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Eldian you control.

card.name: Inform the Masses
card.text: Expose up to 4 cards from your hand. For each card exposed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Expose

card.name: Show of Power

card.name: Pay in Confidence
card.text: Expose a card from your hand. Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of non-generic symbols in its mana cost.

card.name: Preemptive Funeral
card.text: As an additional cost to casting this spell, sacrifice a creature. Mill the top 4 cards of your library. You may cast a creature from among them with mana value less than or equal to that of the sacrificed creature without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Open Burial
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card you expose from your hand as you cast it. Return target creature from any graveyard under your control with a finality counter. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Search your graveyard for a land and put it on the battlefield. Untap it.

card.name: Exposed Metal

card.name: Nape Strike

card.name: Dedicate Your Hearts!
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. If you own three or more exposed cards, they get an additional +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Founder's Denial
card.text: Counter target spell. If it was a Giant spell, tap target permanent.

card.name: Attack Titan's Will
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of target opponent's library. Exile a nonland card from among them face-down with 5 time counters on it and put the rest back on the top of their library in any order. At the beginning of that player's upkeep, remove one. Then if it has none, put it in their graveyard and cast a copy of it. You choose targets for the copy. Rebound
